name.ja: アルトメギア・インパスト －<ruby>奪<rt>だっ</rt></ruby><ruby>還<rt>かん</rt></ruby>－

text.en: If you control an "Artmage" monster, you can activate this card the turn it was Set. When your opponent activates a monster effect: Banish 1 Fusion Monster you control (until the End Phase), and if you do, negate the activation, and if you do that, destroy that card, then if you have 3 or more different Monster Types on your field, you can return all Spells/Traps your opponent controls to the hand. You can only activate 1 "Artmage Impasto -Recapture-" per turn.
